item.title: Read json file with random key in Go Lang
item.description: I stumbled upon a case, where i should import bunch of data in JSON to convert to other thing. (I’ll write about this other thing in other post). Go lang become my first language of choice, to do this. Unfortunately the data saved in json each nested in a random key. Here is how i did it Assume your data looks like this { { "0BVxYRh8MixS0mYEtZ8v":{ "title":"the titls", "subject":"the subject" }, "0BVxYRh8MixasdS0mYEtZ8v":{ "title":"the titls2", "subject":"the subject2" } } Go gile In our Go file
